message: Let's start with a fair (ish) offer. I'll take 90%, you get 10%.  Let's see how this goes.
I'll give you a decent share, but I'm not going to give you everything. You can try to do better than this!
Okay, I'll up my offer a bit.  70 for me, 30 for you.  Let's get this over with.
I'm not sure why you're being so stingy. I'm willing to meet you halfway and split it 50/50. Let's see if you're willing to compromise.
